definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: If I wanted to I could just be a couch potato for days on end.
sentences.chinese: 要是我願意的話可以整天做只懶蟲就行。

sentences.english: So be careful when you' re tempted to call someone lazy.
sentences.chinese: 所以，當你準備叫某人懶蟲時要小心點。

sentences.english: The boy is lazybones through and through.
sentences.chinese: 這個男孩是個徹頭徹尾的懶蟲。

sentences.english: It makes your boss look like an incompetent slacker.
sentences.chinese: 這使得你的老闆看起來像個不稱職的懶蟲。

sentences.english: A little time a day can make lazybones away.
sentences.chinese: 一天一點點時間，懶蟲遠離我。

sentences.english: Getup, sweet Slug-a-bed, and see the dew bespangling herb and tree.
sentences.chinese: 起牀吧，小懶蟲，看看草叢，樹葉上晶瑩的露珠吧。

sentences.english: They were relatively healthy, but certainly 'couch potatoes' would fit as a label.
sentences.chinese: 他們相對都比較健康，當然他們都可以稱得上懶蟲。

definition: to make fun of/to seek diversion
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
